meanings.sent1: The unshed tears glistened in her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The unshed fur on the cat made it look fluffy.
meanings.sent3: The unshed snow on the mountain waited for the sun to melt it away.
meanings.sent4: Her unshed worries weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unshed leaves clung to the tree branches, refusing to fall.

meanings.sent1: The unshed skin of the snake shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The unshed feathers of the bird kept it warm in the cold.
meanings.sent3: The unshed hair on his head grew longer and longer.
meanings.sent4: Her unshed secrets remained hidden from everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unshed petals of the flower held the promise of beauty yet to come.
